title: Grudger v1.1.3
description:
Grudger puts his life on the line for the morally ambiguous strangers he calls his customers. He's a lowlife free runner in a dangerous steampunk world and he always delivers the goods.

There is no life bar in this puzzle-runner hybrid; only the sound of crushed bones. Run, jump, roll, dash and bounce off walls to proceed. Use your environment to master all 45 levels in this acrobatic adventure.

Game features:
-Explore; change running direction anytime
-Challenge your mind with puzzle-flavored level design
-Swipe to act; never have to slip on a pseudo-button
-Collect aluminum bars to unlock survival run mode
-Master 45 parkour levels (more coming soon)
-Find hidden easter eggs
-Ragdoll death scenes
-Swarm based Scores and Achievements
-More than just a running game

If you love parkour, steampunk or platform games you will love Grudger.

What's in this version:
-improved controls
-new survival mode for Shaffield
-Swarm based Scores and Achievements
